mainText:
Steve,

The way you have shaped this company since you took aver has been 
amazing. With your help and guidance, you have built amazing retail 
stores all over the world that promote well-made products and a very 
customer-service oriented atmosphere. I can't tell you how much I wanted 
a job at the Apple store purely because of the amazing and refreshing 
store experience. Three months ago, I got my wish and I've enjoyed every 
single moment working at the Apple store, I am truly surrounded by 
absolutely wonderful people; people that you have helped shape.

Thank you for your wonderful ideas, your wonderful products and your 
wonderful spirit.

You will truly be missed.
author: Gaetan
